flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
真夜中　闇に　紛れて　さまよっている。
ママに　しかられるような　悪い子は　ヨマワルに
さらわれるという　言い伝えが　残っている。

Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight.
There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving
children that this Pokémon will spirit away bad children who
earn scoldings from their mothers.

Duskull vaga come un’anima persa nella tetra oscurità
notturna. Spesso ai bimbi capricciosi si dice che questo
Pokémon si porta via i bambini che fanno arrabbiare la mamma.

Duskull vaga perdido por la oscuridad de la noche. Cuando
los niños se portan mal y desobedecen a sus padres, se les
dice que este Pokémon aparecerá y se los llevará con él.

Zwirrlicht wandert verloren durch die tiefe Dunkelheit
der Nacht. Kinder werden oft ermahnt, dass dieses
Pokémon böse Kinder wegzaubert, die von ihren
Müttern ausgeschimpft worden sind.

Skelénox erre seul dans l’obscurité de la nuit. On fait souvent
peur aux enfants en leur disant que ce Pokémon viendra
les chercher s’ils n’obéissent pas à leur maman.

한밤중 어둠에 섞여 떠돌고 있다.
엄마에게 꾸중을 듣는 나쁜 아이는
해골몽이 잡아간다는 전설이 남아 있다.

まよなか　や に　まぎれて　さまよっている。
ママに　しかられるような　わるいこは　ヨマワルに
さらわれるという　いいつたえが　のこっている。

どんなに　厚い　カベも　通り抜ける。
ねらわれたら　最後　朝日が　登るまで
ずっと　追いかけられる　ことに　なるぞ。

Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may
be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly
pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.

Duskull riesce a passare attraverso i muri indipendentemente
dal loro spessore. Una volta scelto un bersaglio perseguita
la vittima designata fino all’alba.

Duskull puede atravesar los muros, sea cual sea el grosor que
tengan. Cuando este Pokémon elige su objetivo, lo persigue
hábilmente hasta el amanecer.

Zwirrlicht kann durch jede Wand gehen, egal, wie dick diese
ist. Wenn dieses Pokémon sich ein Ziel gesucht hat, verfolgt
es seinen Feind unnachgiebig bis zum Sonnenaufgang.

Skelénox peut traverser n’importe quel mur, même le plus
épais. Une fois que ce Pokémon a choisi une cible,
il la pourchasse sans relâche jusqu’à l’aube.

아무리 두꺼운 벽이라도 통과한다.
한 번 노려지면 아침 해가 뜰 때까지
계속 쫓겨 다니게 된다.

どんなに　あつい　カベも　とおりぬける。
ねらわれたら　さいご　あさひが　のぼるまで
ずっと　おいかけられる　ことに　なるぞ。

いいつけを　守らない　子供を
見つけると　真夜中に　どこかへ
連れて行くと　言われている。

If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their
parents, it will spirit them away--or so it’s said.

Si racconta che questo Pokémon porti via nella
notte i bambini che sono stati disobbedienti.

Corre el rumor de que, por las noches, se lleva a los
niños que no son obedientes.

Man sagt, es suche sich unartige Kinder und
verschleppe sie nachts an einen unbekannten Ort.

On dit que Skelénox emporte les enfants
désobéissants à la nuit tombée.

말을 잘 안 듣는 아이를
발견하면 한밤중에 어딘가로
데려간다고 전해진다.

いいつけを　まもらない　こどもを
みつけると　よなかに　どこかへ
つれて　いくと　いわれている。

どこまでも　獲物を　追い続ける。
執念深い　性格だが
朝日が　昇ると　あきらめる。

It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes.
However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.

Segue ostinatamente la preda ovunque essa vada.
Abbandona la caccia solo all’alba.

Persigue a su presa sin descanso allá donde vaya.
No obstante, abandona la caza al amanecer.

Verbissen verfolgt es seine Beute überallhin.
Doch sobald die Sonne aufgeht, ist die Jagd vorbei.

Il poursuit assidûment sa proie, où qu’elle aille.
Il n’abandonne sa traque qu’au lever du soleil.

어디까지라도 먹이를 쫓아가는
집념이 강한 성격이지만
아침 해가 떠오르면 포기한다.

どこまでも　えものを　おいつづける
しゅうねんぶかい　せいかくだが
あさひが　のぼると　あきらめる。

It loves the crying of children. It
startles bad kids by passing
through walls and making them cry.

It loves the crying of children. It
startles bad kids by passing
through walls and making them cry.

It loves the crying of children. It
startles bad kids by passing
through walls and making them cry.

Les cris des enfants l’amusent.
Il effraie les moins sages d’entre
eux en traversant les murs.

It loves the crying of children. It
startles bad kids by passing
through walls and making them cry.

Les cris des enfants l’amusent.
Il effraie les moins sages d’entre
eux en traversant les murs.

If it finds bad children who won’t
listen to their parents, it will
spirit them away--or so it’s said.

If it finds bad children who won’t
listen to their parents, it will
spirit them away--or so it’s said.

It loves the crying of children. It
startles bad kids by passing
through walls and making them cry.

It doggedly pursues its prey
wherever it goes. However, the
chase is abandoned at sunrise.

It doggedly pursues its prey
wherever it goes. However, the
chase is abandoned at sunrise.

Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks
up to prey. It has the ability to slip
through thick walls.

Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks
up to prey. It has the ability to slip
through thick walls.

A glare from its single scarlet eye makes
even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear.
It is a nocturnal POKéMON that roams
about under the cloak of darkness.

DUSKULL wanders lost among the deep
darkness of midnight. There is an oft-
told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this POKéMON will spirit
away bad children who earn scoldings
from their mothers.

DUSKULL can pass through any wall no
matter how thick it may be.
Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended
victim until the break of dawn.
